He explained: After the show it was fun. Especially Simon Cowell 's dressing room. You never knew what to expect when you walked in- it could be a party. "I think the judges should be able to opt out. I think it stinks when you have to choose between your own acts- I wouldn't do it if I were them. Cheryl Cole wasn't the first to opt out- Sharon once walked off the show for about five minutes. " Simon Cowell has the best guests.
